base_description: Cylindrical, grey with gold ends, medium-sized.
part_description: Two grey cylindrical sections with gold caps at each end, connected by a central gold band.
internal_interaction_description: The two grey cylindrical sections are connected by a central gold band, allowing them to align and form a single elongated structure. The gold caps at each end provide closure and stability to the cylinders, maintaining their shape and position.
external_interaction_description: The object can be held by hand, with the gold caps providing grip. It may interact with other cylindrical holders or stands, fitting into compatible slots or clips. The structure allows for easy manipulation and placement in various environments.
